title: Tajikistan bans hijab in campaign against public religiosity: All you need to know
content: ​Tajikistan parliament has approved the law banning hijab referred to as 'alien garments' ahead of Eid al-Fitr and Eid Al-Adha imposing penalties for offenders. The move comes as part of the government's continuous efforts to curb public display of religion and to promote Tajiki culture. It also banned Idi, the custom in which children seek gift and money during Eid. The Muslim-majority country is dominated by various sects of Islam -- Sunni Muslim population in majority.
summary: ​Tajikistan parliament has approved the law banning hijab referred to as 'alien garments' ahead of Eid al-Fitr and Eid Al-Adha imposing penalties for offenders. The move comes as part of the government's continuous efforts to curb public display of religion and to promote Tajiki culture. It also banned Idi, the custom in which children seek gift and money during Eid. The Muslim-majority country is dominated by various sects of Islam -- Sunni Muslim population in majority.

title: Taylor Swift's epic selfie with Prince William has a hidden message
content: ​Taylor has been dating Travis Kelce for almost a year now but the duo made their relationship Instagram official as Saturday with Taylor posting a selfie with Prince William in London. Fans are claiming that this was the most epic way to debut on Instagram -- with Prince William, Prince George and Princess Charlotte. It was a backstage moment during Taylor's maiden London Eras Tour show at Wembley Stadium.
summary: ​Taylor has been dating Travis Kelce for almost a year now but the duo made their relationship Instagram official as Saturday with Taylor posting a selfie with Prince William in London. Fans are claiming that this was the most epic way to debut on Instagram -- with Prince William, Prince George and Princess Charlotte. It was a backstage moment during Taylor's maiden London Eras Tour show at Wembley Stadium.

title: Barron Trump and DJT meme coin: What is the new controversy?
content: Infamous Martin Shkreli recently claimed Donald Trump's youngest son Barron Trump approached him through a friend for creating the DJT meme coin. But Martin Shkreli could not provide any evidence of Barron Trump's involvement in the project. Crypto sleuth ZachXBT unveiled that Shkreli had created the token as part of an alleged pump-and-dump scheme.
summary: Infamous Martin Shkreli recently claimed Donald Trump's youngest son Barron Trump approached him through a friend for creating the DJT meme coin. But Martin Shkreli could not provide any evidence of Barron Trump's involvement in the project. Crypto sleuth ZachXBT unveiled that Shkreli had created the token as part of an alleged pump-and-dump scheme.

title: Who is viral 'hawk tuah' girl? 5 things about this Internet sensation
content: 'Hawk tuah' has taken over the Internet as social media users are having a hard time to get over the viral 'hawk tuah' girl. The vigorous act of spitting in reply to an otherwise erotic question left the Internet stunned and now 'hawk tuah' merchandise are also available. title: How Apple's Tim Cook responded to Donald Trump's Green Card proposal
content: Apple's Tim Cook was one of the titans present at a business roundtable meeting where Donald Trump talked about finding ways to keep US-educated talent at home. The tech and business leaders supported Trump's idea and days after the roundtable, Trump, in a podcast, said that he would give automatic Green Cards to foreign students graduating in US, if elected to power.
summary: Apple's Tim Cook was one of the titans present at a business roundtable meeting where Donald Trump talked about finding ways to keep US-educated talent at home. The tech and business leaders supported Trump's idea and days after the roundtable, Trump, in a podcast, said that he would give automatic Green Cards to foreign students graduating in US, if elected to power.

title: Watch: Prince William 'shakes it off' at Taylor Swift concert. A selfie follows
content: It was Taylor Swift's first concert in London and Prince William's 42nd birthday. Both the occasions merged as William decided to celebrate his birthday witnessing Swift's magic from a private box at Wembley Stadium where he took Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis.
summary: It was Taylor Swift's first concert in London and Prince William's 42nd birthday. Both the occasions merged as William decided to celebrate his birthday witnessing Swift's magic from a private box at Wembley Stadium where he took Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis.

title: 'Vomiting face emoji': 3 deans at Columbia University placed on leave for belittling campus Jews' worries
content: Three deans of Columbia University were passing snide remarks on a group chat when a panel discussion on Jewish campus life was going on. They said the remarks of the panelists; were difficult to listen to and one of the deans posted vomiting face emoji. Their chats were photographed by an alum sitting behind one of the deans.
summary: Three deans of Columbia University were passing snide remarks on a group chat when a panel discussion on Jewish campus life was going on. They said the remarks of the panelists; were difficult to listen to and one of the deans posted vomiting face emoji. Their chats were photographed by an alum sitting behind one of the deans.

6 members of family found dead in landslide in China, severe weather warning extended
content: Severe downpours in China's Fujian province triggered deadly landslides, claiming the lives of six family members who sought refuge in a temple. Nearby, Guangdong province reports a death toll of 47 from the relentless rainfall, causing widespread destruction. The national meteorological center issued warnings for more severe weather, spanning southern and northern regions, with forecasts predicting hail and intense thunderstorms in multiple provinces.
summary: Severe downpours in China's Fujian province triggered deadly landslides, claiming the lives of six family members who sought refuge in a temple. Nearby, Guangdong province reports a death toll of 47 from the relentless rainfall, causing widespread destruction. The national meteorological center issued warnings for more severe weather, spanning southern and northern regions, with forecasts predicting hail and intense thunderstorms in multiple provinces.

title: Night watchman found dead in Paris hotel after robbery bid
content: In Paris, a night watchman is found murdered in a hotel room after a failed heist targeting a safe filled with the establishment's monthly earnings. The assailants, masked and armed, abandoned the safe and fled, leaving the watchman bound and beaten. Authorities are investigating the crime, probing motives of theft and homicide amid a complex chain of events.
summary: In Paris, a night watchman is found murdered in a hotel room after a failed heist targeting a safe filled with the establishment's monthly earnings. The assailants, masked and armed, abandoned the safe and fled, leaving the watchman bound and beaten. Authorities are investigating the crime, probing motives of theft and homicide amid a complex chain of events.

title: Rocket carrying French-Chinese satellite launches from southwestern China to study gamma-ray bursts
content: A Long March 2-C rocket launched the French-Chinese SVOM satellite to study gamma-ray bursts, cosmic events from star explosions or mergers, aiming to provide valuable data on the universe's evolution.
summary: A Long March 2-C rocket launched the French-Chinese SVOM satellite to study gamma-ray bursts, cosmic events from star explosions or mergers, aiming to provide valuable data on the universe's evolution.

title: Clash of thieves: Two thugs race, fight with each other to steal package in US
‘High as a Kite’ internet mocks fatigued Donald Trump in Truth Social video
content: Former US President Donald Trump faces online ridicule for appearing fatigued and struggling to keep his eyes open in a video on Truth Social, mocked for alleged drug use and tensions with President Joe Biden, with demands for drug tests ahead of upcoming debates in June and September.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump faces online ridicule for appearing fatigued and struggling to keep his eyes open in a video on Truth Social, mocked for alleged drug use and tensions with President Joe Biden, with demands for drug tests ahead of upcoming debates in June and September.
